definition: hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Each logic family has a "unit load expressed in milliamperes. ""
sentences.chinese: 各類邏輯電路都有一個用毫安表示的“單位負載。”

sentences.english: He was demonstrating hydrogen gas production at milliamp and kilovolt levels.
sentences.chinese: 他示範並千伏各級氫氣產量爲毫安。

sentences.english: Digital display meter tells the current that goes through servo valve and the unit is mA.
sentences.chinese: 數顯表顯示的是通過伺服閥的電流值，單位是毫安。

sentences.english: For continuous operation a maximum nominal current of 250 mA is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 爲實現連續運行，建議最大標稱電流爲250毫安。

sentences.english: The output current of the high pressure is equal to or less than 2 milliamperes.
sentences.chinese: 所述高壓發生器的輸出電流等於或小於2毫安。

sentences.english: Maximum signal currents are of the order of 50 ma.
sentences.chinese: 最大信號電流是在50毫安這個數量級。

sentences.english: The same principles of low internal resistance also apply to milliammeters.
sentences.chinese: 低內阻的原理也同樣適用於毫安表。

sentences.english: In comparison, your input stage idles at about 2ma.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，你的輸入級約2毫安。

definition: quantity of electric charge or current
to wait for an opportunity/(electronic devices) standby
AA battery (PRC)/Taiwan equivalent: 三號電池|三号电池
